jobDescription: DATA SCIENTIST/SOFTWARE ENGINEER, McGovern Institute for Brain Research, to work under the supervision of principal research scientist Dr. Satra Ghosh of the Gabrieli lab. Will participate in a broad array of projects in neuroinformatics. This will include extending nipype by developing novel dataflow architectures for big local and distributed data (including single sample TB size datasets); architecting reproducible research platforms and applications as service platforms; datamining genotype-phenotype data for discovery using large imaging genetic datasets; and conducting predictive analytics in mental health using data from smartphone platforms. Working on these projects will involve collaboration with partners within and across regional and international institutions. Will be expected to develop algorithms and prototype ideas; contribute to open source tools; and perform software engineering, testing, and validation. The position also offers an opportunity to mentor undergraduate and graduate students and contribute to data science at MIT.
